ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request - Private hipchat support
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It would be nice to be able to specify a hipchat server in the configuration for those of us with private self-hosted hipchat enterprise servers.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1010 from masarakki/image-with-hostname enable to specify image with hostname

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1016 from davidmc24/feature/hipchat-server Add server parameter to hipchat configuration (#950)
